# SPARK Project Tracker - Trello Clone

## Project Overview
A full-stack task management application using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) with JWT authentication and drag-and-drop functionality.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React.js with react-beautiful-dnd
- Backend: Node.js + Express.js
- Database: MongoDB with Mongoose ORM
- Authentication: JWT

## Project Status
✅ Project structure created
⏳ Backend implementation in progress
